description: A dust helper to load i18n content at render time
name: dust-usecontent-helper

scripts.prepublish: webpack index.js index.amd.js --output-library-target=amd --library=dust-usecontent-helper && webpack index.js index.umd.js --output-library-target=umd && webpack index.js index.browser.js --output-library-target=var --library=dustUsecontentHelper
